summary: No explicit requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so there are no verifiable missing implementations. The diff only modifies project_state.json and appears to introduce/describe product/storefront-related features unrelated to the stated 'Retry deployment' task, which were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/recorded multiple storefront/product/admin/buyer-library/React Query/theme/marketing-image/UI update-request features in project state, despite the BuildRequest having no requirements and explicitly listing these areas as non-goals.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is about 'Retry deployment' and states non-goals including new product/purchase/entitlement/upload features; the diff shows project_state.json summary and existing_features entries describing those product/storefront capabilities.
